mean_cn: n. 身体末端 （尤指手和脚）；尽头，末端，极端；脚趾
mean_en: the parts of your body that are furthest from the centre, especially your hands and feet
sentence: He tried to warm up his extremities by holding them close to the fire.
sentence_trans: 他想手脚暖和些，于是靠近火堆。
word_etyma: extrem=extreme极端 ＋ ity表名词 → 极端手段 → extremity非常手段
